content: *single_crochet 7 decrease* x6 48 r19 single_crochet around 48 start stuffing the body r20 *single_crochet 6 decrease* x6 42 r21 *single_crochet 5 decrease* x6 36 r22 *single_crochet 4 decrease* x6 30 r23 *single_crochet 3 decrease* x6 24 r24 *single_crochet 2 increase* x2 single_crochet 2 switch to color #2 to start headpatch increase *single_crochet 2 increase* x5 32 finish stuffing the body r25 switch to color #1 *single_crochet 3 increase* x2 single_crochet 3 switch to color #2 increase *single_crochet 3 increase* x5 switching back to color #1 halfway through the last increase only the very last stitch should be color #1 40 r26 *single_crochet 4 increase* x2 single_crochet 4 switch to color #2 increase *single_crochet 4 increase* x4 single_crochet 3 switch to color #1 single_crochet increase 48 r27 *single_crochet 5 increase* x2 single_crochet 5 switch to color #2 increase *single_crochet 5 increase* x4 single_crochet 2 switch to color #1 single_crochet 3 increase 56 r28 *single_crochet 6 increase* x2 single_crochet 6 switch to color #2 increase *single_crochet 6 increase* x4 single_crochet switch to color #1 single_crochet 5 increase 64 r29 - r30 single_crochet 22 switch to color #2 single_crochet 35 switch to color #1 single_crochet 7 64 r31 single_crochet 22 switch to color #2 single_crochet 36 switch to color #1 single_crochet 6 64 r32 single_crochet 21 switch to color #2 single_crochet 38 switch to color #1 single_crochet 5 64 r33 single_crochet 20 switch to color #2 single_crochet 40 switch to color #1 single_crochet 4 64 r34 single_crochet 19 switch to color #2 single_crochet 42 switch to color #1 single_crochet 3 64 r35 single_crochet 6 switch to color #2 single_crochet 3 switch to color #1 single_crochet 9 switch to color #2 single_crochet 44 switch to color #1 single_crochet 2 64 ● this round is where the center of the headpatch starts r36 single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 switch to color #2 single_crochet 5 switch to color #1 single_crochet 3 decrease single_crochet 2 switch to color #2 single_crochet 5 decrease *single_crochet 6 decrease* x5 56 start stuffing the head and add a bit more every round ● attach eyes between r33 and r34 r37 *single_crochet 5 decrease* x8 48 r38 *single_crochet 4 decrease* x8 40 r39 *single_crochet 3 decrease* x8 32 r40 *single_crochet 2 decrease* x8 24 r41 *single_crochet decrease* x8 16 finish stuffing the head r42 decrease x8 slip_stitch fasten_off arms make 2 using color #2 start with a ch4 and slip_stitch to form a circle or use a magic_ring r1 8 single_crochet in the middle of ch4/magic_ring 8 r2 increase in every stitch 16 r3 - r4 single_crochet around 16 r5 *single_crochet 7 increase* x2 18 r6 - r7 single_crochet around 18 r8 *single_crochet 8 increase* 20 r9 - r10 single_crochet around 20 r11 *single_crochet 9 increase* 22 r12 - r13 single_crochet around 22 r14 fold in half and single_crochet 11 across the top fasten_off do not stuff beak chain 4 using color #3 we will be working around this chain r1 skipping the first chain single_crochet in the next two stitches then
